title: Dart
description: Dart is a client-optimized language for developing fast apps on any platform, especially Flutter.

snippets.Null Safety:
String? name;  // Nullable
String name2 = 'John';  // Non-nullable

// Null-aware operators
var length = name?.length;  // null if name is null
var value = name ?? 'Default';  // Default if null
name ??= 'John';  // Assign if null
